DESCRIPTION: The incantation of Ka, Tu or Lu, produces the effect of the respective power and then removes it
At end of turn, this creature gains health equal to half of its #bEssence, rounded down. It loses 1 #bEssence each turn
At the start of the enemy turn, deal damage equal to the total #bFlux on all creatures to each creature with #bFlux. Each creature with #bFlux loses 1 #bFlux each turn
Upon Chant, gain 4 Block and apply 3 #bFlux to a random enemy.
Upon Chant, apply 3 #bFlux to a random enemy and draw 2 cards.
Upon Chant, draw 2 cards and gain 4 Block.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
